description_html: In our everyday existence, light serves us by enhancing everything around it, while it itself is often neglected. Here, the attention is given back to the source of light, treating it as an invaluably precious, albeit fragile, element. With its delicate wiring and bulb exposed, it requires the additional armature and structural support of the leather strap and brass hooks, while the glass bulb cocoons around and protects its gentle glow.
